Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class contains the information of a Player. Each player can be identified by its nickname. Each player has a Board, a deck of Assistant cards and a team.

    • switchStudents

      public boolean switchStudents(ArrayList<Color> tableStudents, ArrayList<Integer> lobbyStudentsIndexes)
      Method switchStudents switch the selected table student tiles with the the selected lobby students.
      Parameters:
      tableStudents - : collection of student tiles to be moved from the player's board's table to the the lobby.
      lobbyStudentsIndexes - : collection of integers identifying the selected board's lobby students to be moved to the table.
      Returns:
      true if the move has been correctly executed, false otherwise.
